column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday May 18 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75S near Exit 90 in Richmond (Madison Co):
column4: The roadway is shut down near the 91 mile marker due to a serious collision.  Traffic is backed up to the Clays Ferry Bridge.

column3: I-75S near Exit 90 in Richmond (Madison Co):
column4: Detour at Exit 95 to US-25S to Exit 90, and back to I-75S.

column3: I-75S near Exit 90 in Richmond (Madison Co):
column4: Motorists should expect significant delays starting at the Clays Ferry Bridge.
